thread.section_title: MobileRecharge.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MobileRecharge.com | mobilerecharge.com
thread.title: CJF

author: CJF
title: CJF
text:
MobileRecharge.com is a great way for me to make sure I have prepaid cell balance on a local phone in advance of my arrival. I prefer to use local sim chips, and a day prior to arriving I'll top up the chip through Mobile Recharge so I'll have enough to buy the data package I need as well as be able to make calls.
It's also helpful not to have to go searching an unfamiliar area for a place that sells prepaid minutes or cards or whatever it is.
In my experience the service works flawlessly, and the fees are closer to negligible than anything else.
